channel.description: Recent content in Modern websites for your business in Czech Republic on WEBVAM Studio

item.title: Static Website (Hugo)
item.description:
Fast, secure website without compromises

A static website is a modern solution for businesses that need a fast, secure and stable online presence. Unlike traditional CMS systems, there’s no database or admin panel — your website runs without slowdowns or security risks.

What you get

  • Lightning-fast speed — pages load instantly, Google PageSpeed 95–100/100
  • Maximum security — no database = no CMS hacking attacks
  • SEO advantage — speed is a key ranking factor in search results
  • Multilingual support — multiple languages (CZ, EN, RU, UK and more)
  • Zero CMS maintenance costs — no plugin, theme or core updates needed
  • Modern design — responsive, clean and professional look

Who is it for

  • Corporate presentations and business cards
  • Portfolios and personal websites
  • Landing pages for campaigns
  • Small and medium business websites
  • Information websites and documentation

How it works

  1. Consultation — we discuss your requirements and goals
  2. Design — we create a visual mockup and website structure
  3. Development — we build the website on the Hugo platform
  4. Launch — we deploy the site with an SSL certificate
  5. Support — we provide long-term maintenance and updates

Technology

We use Hugo — one of the fastest static site generators in the world. Hosting on reliable infrastructure with automatic deployment via GitHub.

item.title: CMS Website (WordPress)
item.description:
A website you manage yourself

WordPress is the most popular content management system in the world. If you need a website you can update yourself — change texts, add photos, manage products — WordPress is the right choice.

What you get

  • Simple admin panel — intuitive interface for content management
  • Flexibility — thousands of extensions and plugins for any functionality
  • E-commerce — WooCommerce for online sales
  • Blog — built-in support for articles and news
  • Multilingual — WPML or Polylang for multiple language versions
  • SEO tools — Yoast SEO or Rank Math for optimisation

Who is WordPress for

  • Companies with regularly updated content
  • Online shops and product catalogues
  • Blogs and news portals
  • Websites with user registration
  • Projects requiring specific features

What’s included

  1. Installation and configuration of WordPress on hosting
  2. Custom design — bespoke theme or customised premium theme
  3. Essential plugins — SEO, security, backups, forms
  4. Training — we teach you how to manage content
  5. 30 days of free support after launch

item.title: SEO Optimisation
item.description:
More customers from Google

SEO optimisation ensures your potential customers find your website in search results. We combine technical optimisation with content strategy for long-term results.

What’s included

  • Technical audit — analysis of speed, structure, errors and technical issues
  • On-page optimisation — titles, meta descriptions, headings, structured data
  • Speed optimisation — image compression, code minification, caching
  • Mobile optimisation — responsive design, Core Web Vitals
  • Local SEO — Google Business Profile, local keywords
  • Content strategy — keyword research and content structure planning

Why SEO

  • 68% of online experiences begin with a search engine
  • Organic traffic is the cheapest long-term source of customers
  • Better rankings = greater customer trust
  • SEO works 24/7 without additional advertising costs

Our approach

  1. Audit — we assess the current state of your website and rankings
  2. Analysis — we research competitors and opportunities
  3. Implementation — we carry out technical and content improvements
  4. Monitoring — we track results and Google rankings
  5. Reporting — we keep you informed of progress regularly

item.title: Support & Maintenance
item.description:
Your website in safe hands

Regular website maintenance is essential for security, speed and reliability. We take care of the technical side so you can focus on your business.

What monthly support includes

  • Updates — WordPress core, plugins, themes (for WP sites)
  • Backups — regular full website and database backups
  • Security — monitoring and protection against attacks
  • Uptime monitoring — 24/7 website availability tracking
  • Minor edits — text changes, image updates and small design tweaks
  • Technical support — responses to your questions within 24 hours

Why regular maintenance matters

  • 43% of cyber attacks target small websites
  • An outdated website is a security risk
  • Regular backups mean peace of mind
  • An optimised website means happy customers

Support plans

Basic Standard Premium
Updates ✓ ✓ ✓
Backups weekly daily daily
Content edits 1h/month 3h/month 5h/month
Monitoring ✓ ✓ ✓
Priority support — ✓ ✓
SEO reporting — — ✓

item.title: Domain & Hosting
item.description:
Everything in one place

You don’t need to worry about technical details — we handle domain registration, hosting setup, SSL certificates and email accounts. Everything in one place, one point of contact.

What we provide

  • Domain registration — .cz, .com, .eu and other extensions
  • Hosting — reliable hosting with SSD storage and SSL certificate
  • Email accounts — professional email on your domain (info@yourcompany.cz)
  • SSL certificate — encrypted connection (HTTPS) for security and SEO
  • DNS configuration — proper domain setup
  • Technical support — help with any issues

Why choose us

  • One contact for everything — website, domain, hosting, email
  • Correct setup from the start
  • No hassle with technical details
  • Fair pricing with no hidden fees

Supported platforms

Hosting on the Plesk platform with high availability and automatic backups. For static websites, we also use GitHub Pages and Netlify for maximum speed.
